name: Enefty - NFT Marketplace UI Template Designed With Figma
description:
Enefty is the NFT marketplace UI template for creators and traders. It allows both collectors and creators to trade and exchange their NFTs. The interface is designed after an extensive research and creation of UX. This enabled to make the process very easy for a creator to upload and trade an item on a blockchain as a non-fungible token. For a collector, it makes the flow of the template and its interface makes the whole process easy to collect assets.

Enefty comes with very interactive and modern UI along with a very easy to understand UX. The template has been designed in Figma which makes it easy to be developed.

  • Template comes with 24 Figma screens that covers the whole process
  • 3 Unique Homepage Layouts
  • Dark interface
  • Retina Ready
  • Well Documented
  • Creative Layout
  • Easy to understand layer structure
  • Designed with Bootstrap grid system
  • Free Google Fonts used
  • Easily Customizable
  • Blog page Designs
  • Pixel Perfect Design
  • Based on Extensive UX Research
  • Fonts: Inter â€“ Google Fonts
  • Icons: Flaticon
  • Images: Freepik
